# Container

<p class="description">API docs for the Toolpad Studio Container component.</p>

The Material UI [Container](https://mui.com/material-ui/react-container/).

## Properties

| Name                                    | Type                                   | Default                                | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| :-------------------------------------- | :------------------------------------- | :------------------------------------- | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| <span class="prop-name">children</span> | <span class="prop-type">element</span> |                                        | The content of the component.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| <span class="prop-name">visible</span>  | <span class="prop-type">boolean</span> | <span class="prop-default">true</span> | Control whether container element is visible.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| <span class="prop-name">sx</span>       | <span class="prop-type">object</span>  |                                        | The [`sx` prop](https://mui.com/toolpad/studio/concepts/theming/#overrides) is used for defining custom styles that have access to the theme. All MUI System properties are available via the `sx` prop. In addition, the `sx` prop allows you to specify any other CSS rules you may need. |
